home.projects_experience_title: A Glimpse Into My Project Experience
home.projects_intro: I've had the opportunity to contribute to a variety of exciting projects, developing tailored solutions and integrating advanced functionalities. Here are a few examples showcasing my diverse experience:
home.project1_name: E-commerce Platform for an Italian Firm
home.project1_desc: Developed a multi-language WordPress e-commerce site using Elementor, including custom plugin development and Google Analytics integration for an Italian enterprise. Focused on responsive design and user experience.
home.project2_desc: Built a comprehensive retail system connecting to a Spring Boot API, with a Laravel frontend. Implemented a SOAP-based integration with the Cybersource payment gateway for secure transactions.
home.project3_desc: Created a multi-language media portal using Laravel and React (Inertia.js), featuring an administrative panel with Tailwind CSS for styling. Incorporated interactive elements like video players and carousels.
home.project4_desc: Designed an informative university admissions website using WordPress and Elementor, including custom plugins, to streamline the application process and provide key information.
home.project5_desc: Developed a photography sales platform with Laravel and Inertia.js, complete with an administrative panel. Integrated PayPal as a payment gateway to facilitate secure photo purchases.
home.project6_desc: Constructed a monolithic job board application using a standard Laravel Blade view, incorporating the Woappi payment gateway with payment links for seamless transactions.
home.project7_desc: Developed a robust financial intranet system, featuring a Laravel API secured with JWT for route protection. The React frontend, using React Router, facilitated administration of financial documents across approximately 18 modules.
home.project8_desc: Engineered a monolithic Laravel application with Alpine.js components to automate the generation of IT system proposals. This intricate system comprised 15 modules designed for efficient proposal creation.
